description: Queries for the schema version metadata information.

parameters.name: SchemaId
parameters.description: A wrapper structure that may contain the schema name and Amazon Resource Name (ARN). SchemaArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema. One of SchemaArn or SchemaName has to be provided. SchemaName (string) --- The name of the schema. RegistryName (string) --- The name of the schema registry that contains the schema.

nested_params.name: SchemaArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema. One of SchemaArn or SchemaName has to be provided.

nested_params.name: SchemaName
nested_params.description: The name of the schema. One of SchemaArn or SchemaName has to be provided.

nested_params.name: RegistryName
nested_params.description: The name of the schema registry that contains the schema.

parameters.name: SchemaVersionNumber
parameters.description: The version number of the schema. LatestVersion (boolean) --- The latest version available for the schema. VersionNumber (integer) --- The version number of the schema.

nested_params.name: LatestVersion
nested_params.description: The latest version available for the schema.

nested_params.name: VersionNumber
nested_params.description: The version number of the schema.

parameters.name: MetadataList
parameters.description: Search key-value pairs for metadata, if they are not provided all the metadata information will be fetched. (dict) --- A structure containing a key value pair for metadata. MetadataKey (string) --- A metadata key. MetadataValue (string) --- A metadata key's corresponding value.

nested_items.name: MetadataInfoMap
nested_items.description: A map of a metadata key and associated values.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the entry was created.

nested_items.name: OtherMetadataValueList
nested_items.description: Other metadata belonging to the same metadata key.

nested_items.name: MetadataValue
nested_items.description: The metadata key's corresponding value for the other metadata belonging to the same metadata key.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the entry was created.

nested_items.name: SchemaVersionId
nested_items.description: The unique version ID of the schema version.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token for paginating the returned list of tokens, returned if the current segment of the list is not the last.
